title: Training & Nutrition Healthy flapjack recipe for cyclists: quick, vegan and luxury options
directions: Place all the ingredients in a bowl, and mix thoroughly
Grease or line a baking tray
Spoon out mixture into individual bites
Cook for 15 â€“ 20 minutes at 180 degrees
Remove, allow to cool, and enjoy!
ingredients: 1/3 of a cup of apple sauce (1 cooking apple, cooked and mashed)
1/4 of a cup of almond milk (or rice/soya milk)
1/2 a cup of raisins or sultanas
